title: A conversation with the smart virtual agent can't be started
content:
When the end users want to chat with the smart virtual agent, the conversation keeps loading and users can't start the conversation.

Cause

Inconsistent project value with the value in definition name

Solution

  1. Connect to the REST API as described here.

  2. Send a GET request to https://<serverAddress>/rest/<tenant-id>/virtual-agent/agent to get the original project ID and value.

  3. Send a PUT request to https://<serverAddress>/rest/<tenant-id>/virtual-agent/agent to update the project value with the following body:
    {
          "id": "<project ID get from step 2>",
          "definition": "{\"name\": \"auto_en\", \"project\": \"en\"}"
    }

  4. Go to Service Management main menu, select Administration > Configuration > Virtual Agent Settings, click Train on the INTENTS page.
